summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of North 50th Street from East Green Lake Boulevard to Keystone Place; Ladd Street, from Keystone Place to Kensington Place; North and East 56th Street, from Kensington Place to Latona Avenue; and Meridian Avenue from North 50th Street to North 55th Street; all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 331 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
